ai-patthana24.5:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.5:0.3_0: persuading the shade of the fetters, etc., which covers the shadow of the fetters,
ai-patthana24.5:1.1_0: One cannot give rise to only what is cause, without reason,
ai-patthana24.5:3.1_0: Only go to the teaching, not to restrain the teaching. The cause is reasoned, conditioned by conditions.
ai-patthana24.5:7.1_0: One who doesn’t give rise to the teaching, for the sake of health, not for the sake of reckonings.
ai-patthana24.5:11.1_0: or dejecting the teaching, not the cause of others.
